DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine electrical stimulation ( small level electricity ) safely effectively reduce post-amputation pain . This study involve device call SPRINT System . The SPRINT System deliver mild electrical stimulation nerve residual limb . The SPRINT System include small wire ( call `` lead '' ) place skin upper leg . It also include device worn body delivers stimulation ( call SPRINT Stimulator ) .
DOC.brief_title: Electrical Stimulation Treatment Post-Amputation Pain Using SPRINT System
DOC.criteria: Key At least 18 year old Traumatic low extremity amputation ( ) Healed amputation healthy residual limb base upon investigator 's evaluation Key Change prescribe medication affect pain within past 4 week Compromised immune system base medical history Implanted electronic device Bleeding disorder History valvular heart disease Confounding central nervous system injuries disorder History recurrent skin infection
